column5: Our New Ulm Ranch home is a newly constructed 4BR/2BA rustic, two story barndominium located on 160 tree covered acres with four large, stocked lakes. The ranch is in the small town of New Ulm. It has been a working cattle ranch in the same family since 1954. There are miles of scenic trails through the woods. Fishing is allowed on a catch and release basis. This is a beautiful and tranquil area. Conveniently located about half way between Austin and Houston, a perfect weekend getaway!
